snippet: For the nine men in Marie-Agnès Gillot's new "Sous Apparence," learning the dance has been a crash course in the daily life of their female colleagues: blisters, pain and point-shoe-taming.
abstract: For the nine men in Marie-Agnès Gillot's new "Sous Apparence," learning the dance has been a crash course in the daily life of their female colleagues: blisters, pain and point-shoe-taming.
